meanings.definition: A document allowing the temporary importation of goods into a country without paying duties.
meanings.sent1: The carnet helped the company bring in products without extra fees.
meanings.sent2: She presented her carnet at the border to avoid taxes on the items.
meanings.sent3: The carnet and its magical powers made the customs officer smile.
meanings.sent4: His carnet was like a golden ticket, granting him entry without any obstacles.
meanings.sent5: The carnet was the key that unlocked the gates to hassle-free imports.

meanings.definition: A book of tickets or coupons, especially for travel or entertainment.
meanings.sent1: The carnet of movie tickets was a gift for her birthday.
meanings.sent2: He used his carnet of train passes to explore the city.
meanings.sent3: The carnet of amusement park tickets made her weekend full of joy.
meanings.sent4: Her carnet of vouchers was a treasure trove of fun waiting to be used.
meanings.sent5: The carnet of coupons was her secret to enjoying various activities affordably.
